ReleaseNotes.ReleaseNote: Totally new Aprons with ground signage sitll a work in progress Apron Lights on Apron 9 Correct parking names and place Runways with ILS Enlarged taxiway L Different ATC tower Correct frequencies
Corrected ATIS frequency Added SR technics hangar placeholder Added more ground paintings Added more placeholder buildings Made arrows on painted signs more pointed

- Added GSX Profile (Started) - Adjusted taxiway names to match new charts (Starting 8th August) (Done) - Adjusted parking numbers according to charts (Started) (Need to fix/add ground markings) - Added new Apron 8 South and new parkings (Not Started) - New light poles on Apron 9 (Started) - Taxiway F added since it has been reopened (Done) - Added vehicle path around airport (Started) - Fixed missing runway middle line - Fixed missing runway landing lights - Taxiway G changed to Taxiway Y - Changed part of Taxiway H to H NORTH - Changed taxiway VH to BL
